name: Fast Fiesta Salad

instructions.en: Thaw the broccoli and cauliflower in the fridge overnight.
instructions.sk: Nechajte brokolicu a karfiol rozmraziť cez noc v chladničke.
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーとカリフラワーを一晩冷蔵庫で解凍します。

instructions.en: Drain the thawed vegetables well using a colander or strainer.
instructions.sk: Rozmrazené zeleniny dobre sceďte pomocou cedidla.
instructions.ja: 解凍した野菜をざるやストレーナーでよく水切りします。

instructions.en: Fry the bacon until crisp, then crumble it.
instructions.sk: Opečte slaninu do chrumkava a potom ju rozdrobte.
instructions.ja: ベーコンをカリカリに焼き、細かく砕きます。
青ねぎを薄切りにします。

instructions.en: In a large bowl, combine the drained vegetables, Ranch dressing, shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled bacon, and sliced green onions.
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej miske zmiešajte scedené zeleniny, dresing Ranch, nastrúhaný čedar, rozdrvenú slaninu a nakrájané jarné cibuľky.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルに、水切りした野菜、ランチドレッシング、シュレッドチェダーチーズ、砕いたベーコン、薄切りにした青ねぎを入れて混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Season with salt and pepper to taste, and toss well to coat everything with the dressing.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti a dobre premiešajte, aby sa všetko obalilo dresingom.
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調え、全体にドレッシングがよくからむように混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Chill the salad for at least 1 hour before serving.
instructions.sk: Pred podávaním nechajte šalát chladiť aspoň 1 hodinu.
instructions.ja: 提供前に少なくとも1時間冷やします。

instructions.en: Just before serving, stir the salad well to redistribute the dressing evenly.
instructions.sk: Tesne pred podávaním šalát dobre premiešajte, aby sa dresing rovnomerne rozložil.
instructions.ja: 提供直前に、ドレッシングが均等に行き渡るようにサラダをよく混ぜます。

notes: This Fast Fiesta Salad is a quick and easy keto-friendly dish that's perfect for meal prep. The combination of broccoli and cauliflower provides a good base of low-carb vegetables, while the bacon and cheddar cheese add flavor and healthy fats. The Ranch dressing ties everything together with a creamy, tangy flavor. Remember to thaw the vegetables overnight for the best texture. This salad can be made ahead and stored in the refrigerator, making it a convenient option for busy days. For a spicier version, you could add some diced jalapeños or a dash of hot sauce.
